name: Save State (demo)
description:
Save State is a visual novel about a hero who has already saved the world--now he runs errands in his hometown! Struggling to readjust to village life, he receives a request to find a cursed mirror.

We hope to release the full game this year!

--

Art by Jeanny Kim

Coding and story by corazondekyber

Harmonic font © Monokopus
